EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing You to Your New Honeywell Contact
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Portal <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> | View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Forward to a friend <[[{{system.forwardToFriendLink}}]]>
Dear Valued Honeywell Customer:
We hope you, your family and company are doing well.
To achieve our goal of providing the highest level of service and care possible, we have aligned our area sales managers to meet all your aircraft needs.
Below, you'll find the updated contact information of your area sales manager and a few links to help guide you through our customer support resources. Meet Your Area Sales Manager
Jeremy Snider C: 517.295.9217 E: Jeremy.Snider@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Jeremy.Snider@Honeywell.com]]> Covering Alberta, Kentucky, Michigan, Manitoba, North Carolina, Ohio, Saskatchewan, Tennessee, Virginia and West Virginia.
Email Jeremy <[[mailto:jeremy.snider@honeywell.com]]> Find a Honeywell Channel Partner
Here you can find a list of your local, Honeywell authorized sales and service partners.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]>
Contact Customer Support
It's never been easier -- all of your customer support options in one place. Contact our Honeywell support team today.
Contact us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> MyAerospace Enhancements
Catch up on the latest improvements to MyAerospace as we continue to upgrade our site and its features.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes]]>
Honeywell Support Center
AOG, MyAerospace, ordering parts and more. Visit our support center to find all of our customer support resources.
